content: {A笑眯眯}This <style=Highlight>{赠礼}</style> is <style=Highlight>{命中Tag}</style>! I'd like it if everythin' in my home was this color.
info: NPC日常赠礼回礼-情感2-1010云果_赠礼回礼

content: Ooohhh, it's [article_or_num:1,{赠礼}] <style=Highlight>[quant_noun:1,{赠礼}]</style>! Is this for me to make fertilizer mah~? How thoughtful of you! Thanks!
info: NPC日常赠礼回礼-情感2-1010云果_赠礼回礼

content: {A笑眯眯}Thank you! I love the <style=Highlight>{赠礼}</style>. Living with my Gran'mama, I grew used to all kinds of <style=Highlight>{命中Tag}</style> things around the house.
info: NPC日常赠礼回礼-情感2-1010云果_赠礼回礼

content: It has the fresh fragrance and resilience of bamboo, and it's both lovely and practical. When I put it in my home, it's like... {A灵光一现}I'm still living in the bamboo forest.
info: NPC日常赠礼回礼-情感2-1010云果_赠礼回礼

content: {A笑眯眯}Thank you! I really like the <style=Highlight>{赠礼}</style>. Having <style=Highlight>{命中Tag}</style> in my home makes it feel just like a farm. It's so cozy.
info: NPC日常赠礼回礼-情感2-1010云果_赠礼回礼

content: This <style=Highlight>{赠礼}</style> has <style=Highlight>{命中Tag}</style> on it, giving it such a vibrant look. I really like it, thank you!
info: NPC日常赠礼回礼-情感2-1010云果_赠礼回礼

content: {A想象}Thees <style=Highlight>{命中Tag}</style> flowers seem so rare — they look really special. I love them, thank you!
info: NPC日常赠礼回礼-情感2-1010云果_赠礼回礼

content: {A笑眯眯}This <style=Highlight>{赠礼}</style> has <style=Highlight>{命中Tag}</style> on it! Just like the color of sprouting seeds. I love it, thank you!
info: NPC日常赠礼回礼-情感2-1010云果_赠礼回礼

content: {A笑眯眯}The <style=Highlight>{命中Tag}</style> on this <style=Highlight>{赠礼}</style> looks just like the colors of ripe fruits and veggies! It looks super yummy. I really like it, thank you!
info: NPC日常赠礼回礼-情感2-1010云果_赠礼回礼

content: {A笑眯眯}Thank you! I love the <style=Highlight>{赠礼}</style>. You see, back at Gran'mama's house, all the furniture was made of <style=Highlight>{命中Tag}</style>.
info: NPC日常赠礼回礼-情感2-1010云果_赠礼回礼

content: {A惊叹}Thank you! I love the <style=Highlight>{赠礼}</style>. When I lived in the bamboo forest, I used to make <style=Highlight>{命中Tag}</style> fans, but I never thought to use this material for clothing!
info: NPC日常赠礼回礼-情感2-1010云果_赠礼回礼

content: {A笑眯眯}The <style=Highlight>{命中Tag}</style> on this <style=Highlight>{赠礼}</style> feels as warm as sunshine. I really like it, thank you!
info: NPC日常赠礼回礼-情感2-1010云果_赠礼回礼

content: {A笑眯眯}Thank you! I like my home to have some <style=Highlight>{命中Tag}</style>, just like the <style=Highlight>{赠礼}</style> you gave me.
info: NPC日常赠礼回礼-情感2-1010云果_赠礼回礼

content: It's the color of sprouting seeds, and also the color of the bamboo grove where I grew up. Just seeing it makes me feel all fuzzy and warm!
info: NPC日常赠礼回礼-情感2-1010云果_赠礼回礼

content: {A笑眯眯}So many flowers come in <style=Highlight>{命中Tag}</style>, as if they're imitating the sun's warm colors. I really like them, thank you!
info: NPC日常赠礼回礼-情感2-1010云果_赠礼回礼

content: {A想象}Because you see mah~, red and green, those are the colors of yummy fruits and veggies.

content: {A笑眯眯}If you want cropses and veggies to grow well, first, the soil needs to be fertile enough. I hope the fertilizer I made can help save those poor, barren lands.
info: NPC日常赠礼回礼-情感2-1010云果_赠礼回礼

content: The clothes carry the fresh fragrance of bamboo; it's almost like wearing them could turn me into bamboo! How delightful!
